meanings: (말하다) say, (큰 소리로) call out, (받아 적도록) dictate
What is said is the price

vlive.korean: [서로 껌딱지라고 부르며 팬들 사이에선 '껌딱지즈'로 유명] 뭐 하기만 하면... [They're famous among fans for always being together] Whenever we do something... 듣기 View video M2 : [Full] TOMORROW X TOGETHER Comeback Show
vlive.english: [They're famous among fans for always being together] Whenever we do something...

vlive.korean: [알고 있는 단어 다 뱉는 중] - 짱친 아니야? - 서로 너, 나하고 부르며... [Blurting out all the words they know] - Isn't it Jjang Chin? - Calling each other you... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.86
vlive.english: [Blurting out all the words they know] - Isn't it Jjang Chin? - Calling each other you...

vlive.korean: "이렇게 노래 부르며 술 한 잔 해야 하는데". "You should have some drink after singing". 듣기 View video GAVYNJ : *가비랑 불금할래*
vlive.english: "You should have some drink after singing".

vlive.korean: B 앞에 나서서 노래를 부르며 흥을 돋운다. B. Go to the front and sing to lift the spirit. 듣기 View video V Special : [꽃브로] 꽃미남 브로맨스 - 공찬&홍빈 EP4. "All about my love story"
vlive.english: B. Go to the front and sing to lift the spirit.

vlive.korean: "얼마 전 제자들 앞에서의 공연에서도 god 노래를 메들리로 부르며..." "She also sang god songs in medley in front of her pupils in the concert". 듣기 View video KIM TAE WOO : 김태우의 10주년 '하고 싶은 말' (KIM TAE WOO 10th Anniv. ‘Words I'd Want To Say’)
vlive.english: "She also sang god songs in medley in front of her pupils in the concert".

examples.korean: As he sang, he strummed his guitar. 발음듣기 그는 노래를 부르며 기타를 퉁겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As he sang, he strummed his guitar. 발음

examples.korean: As she sang she strummed on a guitar. 발음듣기 그녀는 노래를 부르며 기타를 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As she sang she strummed on a guitar. 발음

examples.korean: a karaoke machine / night / bar 발음듣기 노래방 기계/노래방에서 노래를 부르며 노는 밤/노래방 시설을 갖춘 술집 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a karaoke machine / night / bar 발음

examples.korean: I was just walking along singing to myself. 발음듣기 나는 혼자서 노래를 부르며 그냥 앞으로 걸어가고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was just walking along singing to myself. 발음

examples.korean: As a Christian, I grew up singing theody. 발음듣기 기독교인으로서, 나는 신을 찬양하는 찬가를 부르며 자랐다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: As a Christian, I grew up singing theody. 발음
